name: Snake Eyes (Veguista, qazwerty104, Kaethon, Jameslroll, nackor, BoredDan, VeteranToast, Clappuccino)
name_original: Snake Eyes (Veguista, qazwerty104, Kaethon, Jameslroll, nackor, BoredDan, VeteranToast, Clappuccino)
description:
Your goal in this game is to dive deeper into the mine and try not to get killed in the process. 

Special mechanics: Reloading will release your true power. Whenever you reload, you roll your special die in the bottom right corner. Depending on your roll your gun might get jammed, or empowered with various buffs. You start with an empty die, but killed enemies will drop better dice you can pick up. 

Controls: 

- R - Reload and roll your special die 
- Q - Swap weapon (required when the weapon is jammed) 
- F - Pick up dropped dice
